pullRequest.title: HDDS-2850. Handle Create container use case in Recon.
pullRequest.bodyText:
What changes were proposed in this pull request?
CREATE container needs to be handled differently in Recon since it is initiated in the SCM, and Recon does not know about that. It should not throw a ContainerNotFoundException when it suddenly sees a new container.
Whenever a new container is created on the Datanode, it sends an incremental container report. This is picked up by Recon, treated as a new container and then Recon queries SCM about the new container.
What is the link to the Apache JIRA
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDDS-2850
How was this patch tested?
Manually tested.
Unit tested.

commit.message: HDDS-2850. Handle Create container use case in Recon.

nodes.bodyText: This should likely be filed as separate Jira, but why is this not a ReadWriteLock?
Minor: instead of getUuid() let toString method of DatanodeDetails determine what is printed.

Nit: can be simplified to
getContainerManager().notifyContainerReportProcessing(false, success);
Seems to be duplicated between these test classes.  Would be nice to reduce it in a follow-up.
